title: Game of Thrones [1080p][5.1][Hi10p] Seasons 1-3
description:
Got tired of having to choose between 4GB episodes or low quality so I encoded this myself. Used CRF (Constant Quality) on all episodes from Untouched RAW BDMV (Blu-ray). Used the same exact settings on every episode. I cant tell the difference between these and the blu-ray unless I pause both on the same frame and get about 3 inches from the screen.

If you want other subtitle options then you can find them and mux them your self from pretty much anywhere.

Oh and don't complain about not having DTS audio. If you can tell the difference between this and the DTS track you either spend WAY to much on audio equipment and should of just bought the blu-rays in the first place or you should submit yourself to scientific studies as the next step in human evolution.

If you need hardware decoding or need to bitstream the audio these encodes are NOT for you! Stick to the 4GB ones.

Source...
Untouched BDMV

Overall bit rate: 4,037 - 7,264 Kbps


Video...
Bit depth: 10 bits
Display aspect ratio: 16:9
Resolution: 1920x1080


English Audio...
Format: LC-AAC
Bit rate: ~500 Kbps
Channels: 5.1


PGS Dothraki English Subtitles and English Subtitles

Chapters ported over from Blu-ray
